description: Enable seamless interaction with the Hyperion blockchain through a standardized MCP interface. Manage wallets, send transactions, query blockchain data, and interact with smart contracts effortlessly. Simplify building and integrating Hyperion-based applications with comprehensive developer tools and robust error handling.

capabilities.name: create_wallet
capabilities.description: Create a new Hyperion wallet with a generated mnemonic phrase

capabilities.name: import_wallet
capabilities.description: Import an existing wallet using private key or mnemonic phrase

capabilities.name: list_wallets
capabilities.description: List all available wallets

capabilities.name: get_balance
capabilities.description: Get the balance of a wallet address (native tokens or ERC20 tokens)

capabilities.name: get_native_balance
capabilities.description: Get the native tMETIS balance of a wallet address on Hyperion testnet

capabilities.name: send_transaction
capabilities.description: Send native tokens or ERC20 tokens to another address

capabilities.name: get_network_info
capabilities.description: Get current network information and status

capabilities.name: get_transaction
capabilities.description: Get details of a transaction by hash

capabilities.name: get_block
capabilities.description: Get block information by number or hash

capabilities.name: estimate_gas
capabilities.description: Estimate gas cost for a transaction

capabilities.name: set_current_wallet
capabilities.description: Set the current active wallet for transactions

capabilities.name: get_current_wallet
capabilities.description: Get the current active wallet information

capabilities.name: deploy_erc20_token
capabilities.description: Deploy a new ERC20 token contract

capabilities.name: deploy_erc721_token
capabilities.description: Deploy a new ERC721 token contract (NFT)

capabilities.name: get_token_info
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive ERC20 token information including name, symbol, decimals, supply, and owner

capabilities.name: mint_tokens
capabilities.description: Mint additional tokens for mintable ERC20 contracts (owner only)

capabilities.name: get_nft_info
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive ERC721 NFT information including collection details and specific token info

capabilities.name: mint_nft
capabilities.description: Mint a new NFT for mintable ERC721 contracts (owner only)

capabilities.name: get_dat_contract
capabilities.description: Get the pre-deployed DAT (Data Anchoring Token) contract address on the LazAI testnet. This contract is managed by the Alith SDK.

capabilities.name: register_dat_file
capabilities.description: Register a file URL with LazAI to get a fileId. This is the first step in the DAT minting workflow. After registering, you can request proof and then claim the DAT reward.

capabilities.name: request_dat_proof
capabilities.description: Request proof verification for a registered file from LazAI verified computing nodes. This is required before claiming a DAT reward.

capabilities.name: claim_dat_reward
capabilities.description: Claim a DAT (Data Anchoring Token) reward for a registered file. This mints the DAT token after the file has been verified by computing nodes (proofs > 0).

capabilities.name: get_dat_file_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a registered file on LazAI by its file ID.

capabilities.name: mint_dat
capabilities.description: Mint a Data Anchoring Token (DAT) on the LazAI testnet. This is a convenience tool that combines register_dat_file and claim_dat_reward. For more control, use those tools separately.

capabilities.name: get_dat_balance
capabilities.description: Get the balance of a specific DAT token for an account on LazAI testnet

capabilities.name: get_dat_uri
capabilities.description: Get the metadata URI for a specific DAT token on LazAI testnet
